underlying_goal: To configure the Ghostty terminal emulator to not warn on close and to copy selected text to the system clipboard.
friction_detail: Claude's initial fix for copy-on-select was incorrect because it didn't account for the distinction between the selection clipboard and the system clipboard on macOS, requiring a second attempt.
primary_success: Diagnosed a subtle platform-specific configuration issue (Ghostty's clipboard behavior on macOS) and provided the correct setting.
brief_summary: The user asked to change their Ghostty terminal configuration. Claude added the settings, but the user reported an issue with copy-on-select. Claude then diagnosed that a specific value was needed for macOS system clipboard integration, fixed the config, and committed only the relevant changes.
